**Senior Learning Advisor Tender Announcement**
========================================================
### Solicitation Details
Tender Reference Number: `T8080-220140`
Solicitation Number: `T8080-220140`
Publication Date: October 25, 2022
Tender Closing Date: November 15, 2022, 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Time)
Regions of Opportunity: Canada
Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

### About the Tender
Transport Canada has a requirement for a Senior Learning Advisor to conduct a Learning Needs Analysis (LNA) to support the Centre of Enforcement Expertise (CEE) in establishing a National Enforcement Program Training Framework for enforcement investigators.

The successful candidate will be responsible for reviewing, qualifying, enhancing, and reporting on existing LNA methodology outcomes. The results of this analysis will define a core training curriculum for Regional Enforcement Unit (REU) Managers and Enforcement Investigators.

### Key Responsibilities
The successful candidate will:

* Conduct a comprehensive Learning Needs Analysis (LNA) to identify the required skills and knowledge for enforcement investigators
* Review and enhance existing LNA methodology outcomes to ensure they align with Transport Canada's requirements
* Develop a core training curriculum for REU Managers and Enforcement Investigators
* Report on the outcomes of the analysis and provide recommendations for improvement

### Eligibility and Qualifications
The successful candidate must have:

* A degree in a related field (e.g., adult education, instructional design, or a related field)
* A minimum of 5 years of experience in learning needs analysis, instructional design, or a related field
* Proven experience in working with government agencies or organizations
* Excellent communication and project management skills

### Contract Award
The contract award will be made through a Request for Proposal (RFP) process. The selected candidate will be awarded a contract for a period of [insert period].
